definition: to eat (of bird or animal)/to feed
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: Operators want the most exciting scenes of the small feeding of goldfish .
sentences.chinese: 最为精彩的要算小金鱼吃食的场面了。

sentences.english: Have you ever watched birds eating on a snowy day?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经看见过鸟儿在雪天里吃食吗？

sentences.english: There are countless people who, ever since their early years, have learned to associate snails with food.
sentences.chinese: 有不计其数的人从小就学会把蜗牛和吃食联系在一起。

sentences.english: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding.
sentences.chinese: 在那里山坡上，有一大群猪吃食。

sentences.english: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding.
sentences.chinese: 餐桌上摆了各种各样的吃食和满杯的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: All kinds of feeding and full cup of wine placed on the tables.
sentences.chinese: 餐桌上摆了各种各样的吃食和满杯的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Two little girls were watching the sparrows eating food at a
sentences.chinese: 两个小女孩在看麻雀们吃食。

sentences.english: For an absolute age, the street food was monopolized by these little yellow biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 许久许久，街上的吃食仍旧为小黄饼所垄断。

sentences.english: The fear of death turnei all my food into poison.
sentences.chinese: 因为我怕着死，所以吃食有如饮鸩。

sentences.english: 32A large herd of pigs was feeding there on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 那里有一大群猪在山上吃食。

sentences.english: Therefore tortoises should be encouraged to drink before hibernation, even though they are not allowed to feed.
sentences.chinese: 所以虽然在冬眠之前不能吃食但应鼓励龟喝一些水。

sentences.english: They sat gobbling their food like pigs at a trough.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐着狼吞虎咽，就像猪在食槽边吃食一样。

sentences.english: In the farmyards, the chickens and even the pigs were too nervous to eat.
sentences.chinese: 在农家院子里，鸡和猪都烦躁不安，以致不吃食。

sentences.english: The pigs fed off the same trough.
sentences.chinese: 这些猪在一个食槽里吃食。

sentences.english: The chickens are eating. But not the piglet.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡们在吃食，但是那只小猪没有吃。

definition: food and drink/food to accompany wine
to eat and drink/food and drink
appetizer/small side dish/easy job/piece of cake/see also 小菜一碟[xiao3 cai4 yi1 die2]
game/wild animals and birds hunted for food or sport
exotic delicacies/luxury foodstuff from distant locations
